title: Alternative Way To Find My Chat Logs?
body: I deleted my email that I made with this account, so I cant access the chat logs to my ban. Any other way of finding them?

replies.body:
If you write into our support team regarding your suspension, we may be able to provide context around your suspension. Create a support ticket [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ill give $1 for my account back if you remove my chat
